title: MD
biography: Robert McKinnon Califf is an American cardiologist who served as the 25th commissioner of food and drugs from 2016 to 2017 and again from 2022 to 2025.
aiSummary: Robert M. Califf is a cardiovascular trials specialist with an H-index of 260 at Duke University (Faculty). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, JAMA, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences. Based in United States.
